alert.note: Alert for Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 2:00AM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Western Millard and Juab Counties, Sanpete Valley, Sevier Valley, Southwest Utah and Upper Sevier River Valleys. * WHEN...From 5 PM Sunday to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Transition times between rain and snow remain uncertain. If rain changes to snow earlier than currently forecast, the advisory start time may need to be adjusted earlier.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley; Southwest Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
